name: Golf Pro VR
description: Golf Pro VR is a fun and challenging golf game built from the ground up for virtual reality and motion controls. Practice your game by hitting targets at the driving range or roam the rolling fairways while playing 18 holes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 891 MB available space
